name: The Luffeltera Renovator
storyline:
The player becomes a tower repairer and prepares for a large-scale tower repair, which is said to be once every 100 years.
Repairs require a great deal of material and money.
First, hire an adventurer to get the material from the tower.
You can earn money by delivering them, or you can use them for repairs.

The main character is still a half-serving repairman, but as he completes the repair work, he gradually gains experience.
If you use his wisdom, you can improve the skills of adventurers and upgrade repair tools.
It is important that he works without fail.

The search will be further expanded by finding accessories called orbs found in the search destination and a map inside the new tower.
The map of the magic tower is mysterious ... You can create your own original map by performing "Shinsei".

The repair work on the tower is tremendous.
Efficiently search and repair, and one day, let's regain the appearance of the beautiful magic tower that is a symbol of the forest!

Merrow Forest, located north of the marine city of Ishwald...
A magic tower, commonly known as the "light blue tower," is erected deep in the forest.

It's an old "light blue tower", but the outer wall is already tattered because there is only an old tower...
The repairman "Melipisa" who is a member of the union "Ruffertera" composed of tower managers
Looking at such a magic tower, I can't help but consider repairing it alone.

I will return this tower to its original beautiful tower-

The wizard of the forest, who grew up with the tower, gathered the rubble of the outer wall that collapsed with her strong determination in her heart.
summary: The Luffeltera Renovator is a repair craft simulation game that completes a large-scale repair of the magic tower of the forest (commonly known as the light blue tower). Regain the brilliance of the decaying magic tower! Collect and craft materials! Sell it, fix it, and cultivate it! Let's complete a large-scale renovation once every 100 years with our friends!
